*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Sibley to Austin, Natchitoches, July 30, 1828. Political news. Local gossip. Rage for railroad construction.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-30-1828">July 30th 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir.*/p*
*p*I have Just Recd your friendly letter dated *location_mentioned*Austin */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-17-1828">17th June*/date_mentioned*, which of us is in debt in our literary Accounts is a subject I am not disposed to discuss at present, I will say that I am glad always to Receive a letter from you and will with pleasure communicate anything to you I may possess of sufficient Interest to excite your attention— we were soon informed of the arrival of *person_mentioned*Genl Taran*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Col Piedras*/person_mentioned* commanding at that *location_mentioned*post */location_mentioned*lately made us a visit and spent ten days here, through him I Recd some communications from the *person_mentioned*Genl */person_mentioned*particularly what he found the *location_mentioned*latitude, longitude, Elevation and degree of heat*/location_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*, and that he was waiting to meet us to designate the *location_mentioned*Boundary line*/location_mentioned*? on that subject I have only been informed officially that the treaty between our Govt and *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*relative to the *location_mentioned*boundary */location_mentioned*and some other matters was Ratified by the *person_mentioned*Senate */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*U States*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="05-01-1828">first of May*/date_mentioned* and Returned to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*to be Exchangd and might be expected back in *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1828">September */date_mentioned*and that the treaty of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819 */date_mentioned* was Recognised generally,, the treaty has not been published and will not be untill it returns, i have not been informed of the Particular Stipulations. I have no Knowledge of the oppointment of a *person_mentioned*commissioner */person_mentioned*on Our part, there is a Report that I shall be named, but I have receivd nothing official about it, If I should I shall Serve and have great pleasure in being associated with *person_mentioned*Genl Taran*/person_mentioned* for whose Character I feel the greatest respect.— I am happy to learn that the Intestine difficulties in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*have subsided, such might have been expected, experience will no doubt tranquilise such Ebilutions, all governments have experienced the Same; *location_mentioned*Primary schools*/location_mentioned* and enlightning the people is the Surest Course.*/p*
*p*The Subject of Our *person_mentioned*Presidential */person_mentioned*Election has produced, and keeps up more excitement than any thing has ever done in the *location_mentioned*United States,*/location_mentioned* the Choice of *person_mentioned*Electors */person_mentioned*conies on in *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1828">November */date_mentioned*next, both *person_mentioned*Parties */person_mentioned*affect to be sanguine of success, for my own part I believe *person_mentioned*Mr. Adams*/person_mentioned* will be Reelected, and the cause of the *person_mentioned*administration*/person_mentioned* seems to be gaining ground, the Printed paper Enclosed I think is a fair Exhibition of the case as it now Stands.—*/p*
*p*I am glad to hear that the Govt of *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*have concluded to settle those*location_mentioned* Belts of Neutral territory*/location_mentioned*, it would have been impossible to have kept those reserves free from *person_mentioned*Banditties of Murderers */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*outlawes*/person_mentioned*— There seems to be some difficulty between the *person_mentioned*three Allied Powers*/person_mentioned* against *location_mentioned*Turkey */location_mentioned*about the division of what may be conquered from *location_mentioned*Turkey*/location_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*France */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*hang Back; but *location_mentioned*Russia */location_mentioned*will go on single handed If they should decline We have no certain Accounts of Actual fighting being commenced Nor of the *person_mentioned*Russian Army*/person_mentioned* crossing the *location_mentioned*Pruth*/location_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Greeks */person_mentioned*will no doubt become indepent of *location_mentioned*Turkey */location_mentioned*tho. not yet acknowledged, there is a great Commotion in *location_mentioned*Europe*/location_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*English */person_mentioned*are Arming and so the *person_mentioned*French*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Brittish */person_mentioned*are withdrawing their *person_mentioned*Troops */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Portugal*/location_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*French */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Spain*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Lord Wellington the Present prime Minister*/person_mentioned* has gone over to *location_mentioned*France*/location_mentioned*, for something about *location_mentioned*Greece */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Turkey */location_mentioned*it is seposed. The Sperit for Internal improvement in the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* was never at such a height *location_mentioned*Rail ways*/location_mentioned* are taking place of *location_mentioned*Canals*/location_mentioned* as having the advantage of costing one third less, not being interrupted by *person_mentioned*Frost*/person_mentioned*, the *location_mentioned*carriages propelled by Steam*/location_mentioned* can freight as low and move Eight Miles an hour, whereas *location_mentioned*Canal Boats*/location_mentioned* go only four.—*/p*
*p*I had *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1827">last winter*/date_mentioned* a Visit from *person_mentioned*Geo. Sibley*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*his *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned* and her *person_mentioned*sister Miss Easton*/person_mentioned*. they spent two Months with us and took away with them *person_mentioned*Mrs Sibley*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Hopkins Sibleys widow*/person_mentioned*, and her Daughter *person_mentioned*Ann*/person_mentioned*. and son *person_mentioned*Harry*/person_mentioned*; *person_mentioned*George */person_mentioned*has lived at *location_mentioned*Fort Ozage*/location_mentioned* and they all left here for that place, but on arriving at *location_mentioned*S. Charles*/location_mentioned* where *person_mentioned*Judge Eastons family */person_mentioned*Reside, *person_mentioned*George */person_mentioned*on Visiting and going over a Tract of Land he had owned for 15 years near that place which he never before had examined was persuaded to settle there and there they all are, they live in the *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*the land they are improving comes within half a Mile; the *location_mentioned*Ozage farm*/location_mentioned* and stock are kept up where they have an hundred Breeding Mares and Jennies etc. *person_mentioned*Judge Easton */person_mentioned*has the Dropsey and cannot live long, they give an account of the Beauty and improvements of *location_mentioned*St. Louis*/location_mentioned*, Increase of Population and Wealth surpassing any Town in the West, *location_mentioned*Cincinnati */location_mentioned*Excepted.— they speak of the New Splendid *location_mentioned*Churches*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*Court */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Market House*/location_mentioned* as in an superior stile, the *location_mentioned*Jefferson Barracks*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*6 miles below where two Regiments of U. S. Troops are kept*/location_mentioned* called the *location_mentioned*School of practice*/location_mentioned* they mention as an Elegant Establishment giving great life and vareity to *location_mentioned*St. Louis.*/location_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Troops */person_mentioned*that were at *location_mentioned*Council Bluff*/location_mentioned* are movd down a few miles above *location_mentioned*Old Fort Ozage*/location_mentioned* and is called the *location_mentioned*Cantonement Levinsworth */location_mentioned*where is a *person_mentioned*Regiment*/person_mentioned*, the *location_mentioned*State of Missouri*/location_mentioned* is rapidly advancing in population Wealth and improvements and are for the Reelection of *person_mentioned*Mr. Adams*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Col Benton*/person_mentioned* to the contrary notwithstanding—*/p*
*p*Our Town of *location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned*improves slowly, we have a large tolerable handsome and well finished *location_mentioned*Catholic Church*/location_mentioned* Nearly done a good looking *location_mentioned*Belfrey */location_mentioned*and a good Bell. Several *location_mentioned*New Houses*/location_mentioned* have been built since you were here, but the distraction of the *location_mentioned*great fire*/location_mentioned* is scarsily repaired, all the *location_mentioned*Small Towns on the Steam Boats navigable Waters*/location_mentioned* seem not to flourish. If an *person_mentioned*inhabitant */person_mentioned*wants a Twist of Tobacco he sends for it by a Steam Boat to his *person_mentioned*Agent */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*N. Orleans*/location_mentioned*, it is sure to come in a few hours, at half what the little *person_mentioned*Jew */person_mentioned*shops would take for the Same Article—*location_mentioned*Alexandria */location_mentioned*from that cause, the Overflow and unhealthiness of the place is almost abandoned *location_mentioned*Houses */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Lotts */location_mentioned*have fallen 800 pr Cent or More.—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Planters */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*Parish */location_mentioned*since the fall of Cotton (many of them) are preparing for sugar, the Ribbon Cane brought from *location_mentioned*China */location_mentioned*comes to perfection in about a Month less time than the *person_mentioned*Creole */person_mentioned*cane no doubt from the experiments already made it will succeed well in this *location_mentioned*Parish*/location_mentioned*; but you have the soil and climate for that Article; but cannot be extensively used without *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned**/p*.—
*p*Our Election for *person_mentioned*Govr Members of Congress*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*state Legislature*/person_mentioned* is just over have not got the Returns for *person_mentioned*Govr*/person_mentioned*, or *person_mentioned*Congress*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Judge Derbigney*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Marigney */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Genl Thomas*/person_mentioned* are the *person_mentioned*Candidates for Congress*/person_mentioned* in this *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Brent */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Overton*/person_mentioned*, we have from this *location_mentioned*Parish */location_mentioned*in Our Legislature A man by the name of *person_mentioned*Dyers Debleau*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Benja Matyear*/person_mentioned*.-— *person_mentioned*Johnston */person_mentioned*Our Present *person_mentioned*Sheriff */person_mentioned*was married a few days ago to the Daughter of *person_mentioned*Mr Benjm Bullitt*/person_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Col Quarles*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Arkensas */location_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*Madme Grosvenor*/person_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Mr. Cable*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*live apart. Several Accidents have hapened by steam Boat Boilers Bursting, the car of Commerce lately, and killed and wounded 57 *person_mentioned*persons*/person_mentioned*. Two have been Burnt and one sunk in *location_mentioned*Red River.*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I did not see *person_mentioned*Capt. Jones*/person_mentioned*, probably when he called I was out about three Miles where My *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*are at a *location_mentioned*Summer residence*/location_mentioned*; where we have good Water and Air. No Musketoes and Milk not Bitter, *person_mentioned*Mr Cable*/person_mentioned* has informed me he had sent you a Packet of papers which will keep you Along till you Receive more-— If the Govt of *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*was better organised, so that one might be protected in person and property and Religion I should feel Enclined to move into it.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-17-1828">17th-July*/date_mentioned*. By the Steam Boat Beaver we have the Election Returns so far as to assertain that *person_mentioned*Judge Derbigney*/person_mentioned* has a Majority of Votes for *person_mentioned*Governor*/person_mentioned*, that *person_mentioned*Judge white*/person_mentioned* a young man (son of *person_mentioned*Doctr White*/person_mentioned* who died *person_mentioned*Parish Judge of *location_mentioned*Attackapa*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*) and lately been Acting as *person_mentioned*City Judge of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, has been *person_mentioned*Elected Member of Congress*/person_mentioned* in place of *person_mentioned*Mr. Livingston*/person_mentioned*; *person_mentioned*Derbigney */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*White */person_mentioned*are for the Reelection of *person_mentioned*Mr. Adams President*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mr. Livingston*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Jackson */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Marigney */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Judge Butler*/person_mentioned* opposed to *person_mentioned*Derbigney */person_mentioned*as Governor are *person_mentioned*Jacksonites*/person_mentioned*. The Votes of *location_mentioned*Louissiana */location_mentioned*will be for *person_mentioned*Adams (President*/person_mentioned*). *person_mentioned*Mr. Gurley*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Batton Rouge*/location_mentioned* (*person_mentioned*Adams*/person_mentioned*) is Reelected by a large Majority. *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Illenois */location_mentioned*for the *person_mentioned*administration */person_mentioned*; and we now believe *person_mentioned*Adams */person_mentioned*will certainly be Reelected—- I sepose you were Acquainted with Our *person_mentioned*Captain Grosvenor*/person_mentioned*; while he was in your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*: Accounts Came on here Satisfactory to his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*that he had another *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*, she had a decree Nullifying her Marriage with *person_mentioned*Grosvenor*/person_mentioned*, and was in *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1828">March last*/date_mentioned* married to a *person_mentioned*Col Quarles*/person_mentioned*, a *person_mentioned*Lawyer */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Little Rock*/location_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Arkensa Territory,*/location_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Col */person_mentioned*after living here with her a short time went to *person_mentioned*Arkensas */person_mentioned*and Returned sooner than he had appointed he soon appeared dissatisfied and went away Again, it is thought will not soon if ever Return to her again. The *person_mentioned*Col */person_mentioned*is a light made, small Man Very Genteal, well informed, a *person_mentioned*Schollar*/person_mentioned*, and stands high at the Bar is I should think under 85.— there is a *person_mentioned*Col Oden*/person_mentioned* living here from *location_mentioned*Arkensa */location_mentioned*also, a Man of Wonderfull Physical and Intellectual powers, was, but not now an intimate friend of *person_mentioned*Col Quarle*/person_mentioned*'s—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Sibley */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*P. S—you have not informed me about my claim on the *location_mentioned*Estate*/location_mentioned* of *person_mentioned*Mc. Farlane*/person_mentioned*.—Since Writing the above we have had more particularly the Return of our Election *person_mentioned*Derbigney */person_mentioned*will be our *person_mentioned*Governor*/person_mentioned*- White for *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*in place of *person_mentioned*Livingston*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Gurley */person_mentioned*Reelected— *person_mentioned*Overton */person_mentioned*in place of *person_mentioned*Brent*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
